name: Spacebar (Andox)
description:
Description

A randomly generated gauntlet of turrets, asteroids, and glass panes stands between you and your customer. Propel yourself forward by jettisoning your product, or launch a lot of it at a turret or asteroid to demolish them. Don't wait too long between shots, though, or you'll freeze in the vacuum of space. Good luck!

Controls

Aim with the mouse. Hold the space bar for as long as you'd like to charge your shot, and release to fire.

A game from Restful Panic ltd
